def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
# Check if a measurementScale is present for each attribute.
if not attributesPresent: output = "No attributes are present, so unable to check for attribute defintions. Check skipped." status = "SKIP" return True
attributeCount = 0 missing = []
for i in range(0, len(attributeDefinition)): attributeCount += 1 definition = attributeDefinition.get(i) name = attributeName.get(i) # No definition for this attribute was specified if(definition == None or len(definition) == 0): missing.append(name) else: if(mvar.isBlank(definition)): missing.append(name) else: continue
if(len(missing) > 0): output = "The following attributes do not have definitions: '{}'".format(', '.join(missing)) status = "FAILURE" return False else: output = "All {} attributes have a definition".format(attributeCount) status = "SUCCESS" return True
